issues.title: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children
issues.description: Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them

relatedNodes.html:
• Home
  • About
  • Contact

any.message: Element has children which are not allowed: ul[tabindex]

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has children which are not allowed: ul[tabindex]

issues.title: Elements with an ARIA `[role]` that require children to contain a specific `[role]` are missing some or all of those required children.
issues.description: Some ARIA parent roles must contain specific child roles to perform their intended accessibility functions. [Learn more about roles and required children elements](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/aria-required-children).

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.nodeLabel: Step 7: Promote your video on social media
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (280.4px by 18px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 18px instead of at least 24px.
